name: Habitation
description: Habitation is a Short Adventure where you search through 5 different habitats for a total of 35 separate animals! Upon finding an animal, it is rated out of 3 stars in each category (Cuteness, Chunkiness, Smartness). A full 9 stars is not something to snuff at! Especially because for select animals, you can uncover Easter Eggs by naming them specific things. Can you find all 35 animals? How many 9 stars will you find? Can you figure out 1 of the 12 Easter Eggs? Find out in Habitation!
